com.googlecode.aluminumproject.utilities.environment

Class FileSystemPropertySetContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.aluminumproject.utilities.environment.FileSystemPropertySetContainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PropertySetContainer

    public class FileSystemPropertySetContainer
extends Object
implements PropertySetContainer
    A property set container that uses the file system to both read and write property sets. Each property set is stored in a properties file that carries its name; the location of the property sets is ~/.aluminum.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FileSystemPropertySetContainer()
      Creates a file system property set container.

      • containsPropertySet

        public boolean containsPropertySet(String name)
        Description copied from interface: PropertySetContainer
        Determines whether this property set container contains a property set with a certain name.
        Specified by:
        containsPropertySet in interface PropertySetContainer
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the property set to check
        Returns:
        true if a property set with the given name exists in this property set container, false otherwise

      • readPropertySet

        public Properties readPropertySet(String name)
                           throws AluminumException
        Description copied from interface: PropertySetContainer
        Reads a property set with a certain name. The returned property set is not live: changes don't automatically propagate back to this container.
        Specified by:
        readPropertySet in interface PropertySetContainer
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the property set to read
        Returns:
        the property set with the given name
        Throws:
        AluminumException - if this property set container does not contain a property set with the given name or when the property set can't be read

      • writePropertySet

        public void writePropertySet(String name,
                    Properties propertySet)
                      throws AluminumException
        Description copied from interface: PropertySetContainer
        Writes a property set. If this property set container does not contain a property set with the given name, it will be created; if a property set with the same name does exist, it will be overwritten.
        Specified by:
        writePropertySet in interface PropertySetContainer
        Parameters:
        name - the name to use for the property set
        propertySet - the property set to write
        Throws:
        AluminumException - when the property set can't be written

      • removePropertySet

        public void removePropertySet(String name)
                       throws AluminumException
        Description copied from interface: PropertySetContainer
        Removes a property set.
        Specified by:
        removePropertySet in interface PropertySetContainer
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the property set to remove
        Throws:
        AluminumException - if this property set container does not contain a property set with the given name
